answers.answer: i was induce with my first preagnancy because i was over almost 2 weeks
Oh wow!! They made you wait that long?
I was induced with my firsta at 39 weeks bcuz i wasnt dialating at all super closed shut
I will be induced at around 38 weeks coz  my baby has a heart condition...i was induced on my first baby coz i was 10 days overdue
I was induced with my daughter because she sat so low the last 2 months and I was 3 cm dilated and it hurt so bad when I walked
Induced at 36 weeks due to a cantaloupe sized cyst on my ovary
I was induced with my first because she was a week late. This one I have gestational diabetes and might have to have a scheduled c section
With my first I got induced at 39 weeks when my water broke but I didn't progress it ended  36 hour after water breaking in emergency csection
I was induced with my first because my water broke and labor didn't start. With my third,I was 8 days over. I am hoping to avoid an induction this time.

I was induced due to baby not moving down into the birth canal, I wasn't dilating fast enough and my cervix wasn't even thinned out at all. My contractions was 1min apart and I was in delivery for more than a day. I was then booked in for a c-section. My precious little girl was born 38wks 4days
Got induced with my first due to gestational diabetes and my doc already said i would be induced again next week when i hit 39 weeks but im going to try and induce naturally at home first.
I was induced both times so far because of eclampsia then preeclampsia. I'm hoping to not get preeclampsia this time. :D
Im being induced in 4 days for very high amniotic fluid.
30 weeks preg. At 34 weeks I'll be induced or have a c section bc my water ruptured completely on Saturday.

I have an appointment in a few hours to discuss getting induced this week. I also have GD and I'm not dilating. I'll be 39 weeks on Saturday and my baby is measuring (they think) over 8 pounds. My doc told me with gestational diabetes they don't want the baby to hit 9 pounds because it can cause problems during delivery.
I will be induced next week, as today is my due date. I'm going to ask if they will induce me in the evening on the 28th so my babies days of birth would be 29, 30, and 31.

question: What are some reasons for you mommies being induced? I have gestational diabetes and I want a natural med free birth so my nurse has been keeping a close eye on my little man's weight. I'm going to talk to her Thursday at my appointment to see if I'm going to have to be induced. Im just curious to know why some of you if any of you had to be induced?
title: Being Induced?..
